item.title: Blitzer + Hot Chicks + Five Bucks + BLASTROKÄTZ
item.description: income tax refund is happy to be part of the committee for the fitout of rock on: Thursday, 07 March 2024 Where: KornXarnXope Doors: 19x00 Start: 19x59! with: Blitzer New EP recorded in Leipzig! bandcamp Hot Chicks Leipzig all stars. You know’em! Legalize It EP (Flennen, 2022) Five Bucks …will perform as a band! bandcamp BLASTROKÄTZ LineVenture-Project of Oliotronix & PilzeFressenFelsen. Overlord of the underground (demo) poster art by Elias de la Moshpit
